patthana21.40:1.1: Naappaccayaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana21.40:2.1: Naappaccayaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana21.40:3.1: (Naappaccayanaanidassanaappaṭighamūlepi ekameva.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
